    • Method Detail

      • getTotalConsumption

        double getTotalConsumption()
        Get the consumption of all device.
        Returns:
        the consumption of all the device present on the platform in Watt.

      • getZoneConsumption

        double getZoneConsumption(String zoneId)
        Get the consumption of a specific zone.
        Parameters:
        zoneId - : id of the zone.
        Returns:
        the consumption of the all the device present in the zone in Watt.

      • getGroupOfDeviceConsumption

        <T extends GenericDevice> double getGroupOfDeviceConsumption(Class<T> clazz)
        Get the consumption of a group of device.
        Type Parameters:
        T - : class that extend Generic device.
        Parameters:
        clazz - : Interface that you want to compute the electricity consumption.
        Returns:
        the consumption of the group of device in Watt.

        Add a listener, must be synchronized.
        Parameters:
        listener - : listener to add.

        void removeListener(ElectricityViewerListener listener)
        Remove a listener, must be synchronized.
        Parameters:
        listener - : listener to remove.
